Sub macro()
Dim gender As string

gender = StrConv(InputBox("Please enter your gender: Male or Female", "Sex"), vbProperCase)

If StrPtr(gender) = 0 Then
Exit Sub
ElseIf gender = "" Then
MsgBox "You didn't enter input"
ElseIf gender = "Male" Then
title = "Mr."
ElseIf gender = "Female" Then
title = "Mrs."
Else
MsgBox ("Please check your input")
End If

End sub

Sub macro()
Dim gender As string

gender = InputBox("Please enter your gender: Male or Female", "Sex")

If StrPtr(gender) = 0 Then
Exit Sub
ElseIf gender = vbNullString Then
MsgBox "You didn't enter input"
ElseIf gender = "Male" Then
title = "Mr."
ElseIf gender = "Female" Then
title = "Mrs."
Else
MsgBox ("Please check your input")
End If

End sub
